trans-unit.source: Specifies how the workflow debugger will step through concurrently executing child activities of a composite activity.
trans-unit.target: Angir hvordan arbeidsflyten feilsøkingsprogrammet gå gjennom samtidig kjøring av underordnede aktiviteter for en sammensatt aktivitet.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] This enumeration is used with the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.DebugEngine.WorkflowDebuggerSteppingAttribute> attribute to define the following two behaviors: - **Concurrent stepping**.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Denne nummerering brukes med den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.DebugEngine.WorkflowDebuggerSteppingAttribute>attributtet definerer følgende to virkemåter:- **samtidige Gå**.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.DebugEngine.WorkflowDebuggerSteppingAttribute>

trans-unit.source: This mode of stepping enables you to step through and debug concurrently executing activities in the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Denne modusen for gå kan du gå gjennom og feilsøking samtidig kjøring aktiviteter i arbeidsflyten.

trans-unit.source: With this option, you will notice that a change in control occurs when concurrently executing activities run within the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Når dette alternativet ser du at en endring i kontrollen oppstår under utførelse samtidig aktiviteter kjøres arbeidsflyten.

trans-unit.source: This mode of stepping enables you to step through and debug a particular branch of a composite activity, such as the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity> or the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup> activity.
trans-unit.target: Denne modusen for gå kan du gå gjennom og feilsøke en bestemt gren for en sammensatt aktivitet som den <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity>eller <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup>aktiviteten.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity>

trans-unit.source: When you use this option to debug, you will not notice that a change in control occurs due to concurrent execution of other activities in the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker dette alternativet kan feilsøke, ser du ikke at det oppstår en endring i kontroll på grunn av samtidige utføring av andre aktiviteter i arbeidsflyten.

trans-unit.source: The debugger only steps through the activities in the currently selected branch while other activities in the workflow may be executing concurrently.
trans-unit.target: Debugger bare trinnene gjennom aktivitetene i den merkede grenen mens andre aktiviteter i en arbeidsflyt kan kjøres samtidig.

trans-unit.source: For example, by default, the leftmost branch in a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity> activity and the first child activity of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup> activity are used for stepping.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel som standard lengst til venstre avdelingen i et <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity>aktiviteten og den første aktiviteten må underordnede for et <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup>aktiviteten brukes til å gå.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity>

trans-unit.source: If you are interested in debugging any other branch or child activity, an explicit breakpoint must be placed on that branch or child activity.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du er interessert i feilsøking andre gren eller underordnet aktiviteten, må en eksplisitt stoppunkt plasseres på den avdelingen eller underordnet aktiviteten.

trans-unit.source: Stepping continues in that branch when the breakpoint is triggered.
trans-unit.target: Gå fortsetter i denne gren når stoppunktet utløses.

trans-unit.source: The child activities will be debugged concurrently.
The child activities will be debugged sequentially.
